title: Oil rises for 2nd day as producers trim output to respond to demand loss
text: Oil extended gains on Thursday amid signs that producers are cutting production to cope with a collapse in demand for fuel as the coronavirus outbreak ravages the world's economies.

title: Kudlow: Decreased coronavirus case rates should be a positive economic sign

title: The New York Stock Exchange could reopen in phases beginning in May
text: The New York Stock Exchange might reopen in phases after May 15, two sources who were on a conference call with NYSE Chief Operating Officer Michael Blaugrund told CNN Business. The sources also say the timing could change.

title: Outlook for Gold Is Positive, Says Evolution Mining’s Klein
text: Jake Klein, executive chairman at Evolution Mining Ltd., discusses his outlook for gold, his business strategy and the operations in Canada. He speaks exclusively on “Bloomberg Daybreak: Asia.”

title: Dollar edges higher against oil currencies as energy markets shaken
text: The dollar pushed ahead against the currencies of oil producers on Thursday as a rebound in crude prices from an unprecedented collapse only partially calmed markets unnerved by the massive coronavirus-led drop in global demand.

title: Citi's Zogheb Sees Leveraged Lending Slow to Rebound After Crisis

title: Chamath Palihapitiya: Buybacks show 'growing strain of incompetence' among CEOs
